original_text: Then he brought back all the possessions, and also brought back his kinsman Lot with his possessions, and the women and the people.
korean_text: 모든 빼앗겼던 재물과 자기의 조카 롯과 그의 재물과 또 부녀와 친척을 다 찾아왔더라

sentences.original_text: Then he brought back all the possessions
He also brought back his kinsman Lot with his possessions
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 그의 친척 롯과 그의 재물을 되찾아 왔고

sentences.original_text: He brought back the women and the people
